Constructor Detail

Shotgun

public Shotgun(java.net.URL url,
               java.lang.String script_name,
               java.lang.String script_key)
Sole Constructor

Parameters:
url - the URL to access, should end with /api3/
script_name - the Script Name of the Script (ApiUser) entity to authenticate
script_key - the Application Key of the Script (ApiUser) entity to authenticate
Method Detail

find

public java.util.List find(FindRequest fr)
                    throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
Find entities of a single type and their field values.

Parameters:
fr - the specification for the request
Returns:
a List of the requested entities. Each item of the list is a Map of field name to field value.
Throws:
org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException - if the request failed

create

public java.util.Map create(CreateRequest cr)
                     throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
Create a single entity.

Parameters:
cr - the specification for the request
Returns:
a Map of field names to field values for the created entity
Throws:
org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException - if the request failed

update

public java.util.Map update(UpdateRequest ur)
                     throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
Update a single entity.

Parameters:
ur - the specification for the request
Returns:
a Map of field names to field values for the updated entity
Throws:
org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException - if the request failed

delete

public boolean delete(DeleteRequest dr)
               throws org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException
Delete a single entity.

Parameters:
dr - the specification for the request
Returns:
true if the entity was deleted, false if it has already been deleted.
Throws:
org.apache.xmlrpc.XmlRpcException - if the request failed
